name: Heroes of Telluria
description:
Welcome to Telluria

This is a simple RPG game with a quite big open world made for the LOWREZJAM 2022.

The goal is to find 4 Ancient Relicts, good luck!

 -X key

 - Z key

 - Arrow key

  - Attack (attacks all enemies in 1 tile radius)

  - Pick up (picks up the item that you're currently standing on, including chests)

 - Move
